pr_title: add optional getter for ratio and phase tap changer

timeline.message:
take remarks in account

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>

improve test coverage and remove useless implementation of method

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>

timeline.bodyText: Not sure you should remove this implementation (even if this method has a default implementation with the same behavior), it makes it explicit that you are using the ratioTapChanger field
timeline.author: MioRtia
MioRtia
MioRtia
MioRtia

timeline.bodyText: You can add an implementation in iidm-impl (even if it is the same behavior) using the field in the impl class rather than the getPhaseTapChanger method
timeline.author: MioRtia
MioRtia
